name: latest_sold
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool most_expensive_nft_artworks.
Tool description: Get list of most expensive and bestselling NFTs ever
API description: Get recent sold artworks list.

**Possible filtering by gallery: **
Art Blocks
Async Art
Auction Houses
Foundation
hic et nunc
KnownOrigin
MakersPlace
Nifty Gateway
SuperRare

page.description: The page number of the results to return. Defaults to '1'.

gallery.description: The name of the gallery to filter results by. Possible values include 'Art Blocks', 'Async Art', 'Auction Houses', 'Foundation', 'hic et nunc', 'KnownOrigin', 'MakersPlace', 'Nifty Gateway', and 'SuperRare'.

sort.description: The parameter by which to sort the results. Defaults to 'date_sold'.
